author: Mrs. Tyler Thompson
title: “Breaking Cardinal Rules” is a bestseller
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 2 Responses 
In news that shouldn’t surprise anyone who reads this site, “Breaking Cardinal Rules: Basketball and the Escort Queen” is now a bestseller on Amazon. The Kindle version, priced at $9.95, is now the #1 selling book in the basketball category. The hardcover version comes out on October 12, and will retail for $17.95. 
In case you’ve been in a cave since the news broke on Friday afternoon, the book claims Louisville staffer/former player Andre McGee paid an escort service to have sex with players and recruits from 2010-2014. The book contains hundreds of journal entries and thousands of text messages kept by Louisville stripper and escort Katina Powell, the madame of the escort service. UofL is now holding an internal investigation and the NCAA has been notified. 
I bought my copy last night. Anyone finish it yet?
